 1998-15171998-08-260,  INDUSTRY,  ,  , 
PrecisRegulations Amending the RADIOCOMMUNICATION REGULATIONS by eliminating the inconsistency between subsections 21(4) and 22(2) as they relate to Acceptance Certificates and to compliance with standards, and by extending the application of section 24 to those who import radio devices and interference-causing or radio-sensitive equipment.
